title: Installation issue: cmake
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue
This problem occurs on Cray XC systems with Cmake versions v3.7.0 - v3.17.0 
Has already been fixed in the release-3.17.3 branch of CMake

This patch is to fix previously released versions

Problem 1:  
CMake Issue: https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/-/issues/20645
CMake MR: https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/-/merge_requests/4681 (merged)
cm_cxx_features: Filter out libhugetlbfs warnings

```console
$ spack install cmake@3.7:3.17
```
Problem 2:  
CMake Issue:  https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/-/issues/20664
CMake MR: https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/-/merge_requests/4698 (merged)
cm_cxx_features: Filter out 'icpc: command line warning #10121' 

```console
$ spack install cmake@3.7:3.17%intel
```

### Impacting LANL ASC customers on CLE7.0 Trinity systems who need Hugepages spack builds produced on e-login nodes and/or need to build with Intel C++ compiler

* **Spack:** 0.14.2-750-1597098ff
* **Python:** 3.6.10
* **Platform:** cray-sles15-x86_64

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt]()

@chuckatkins 

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate

* **THIS MAY DUPLICATE https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/15901**
